channel.title: Embedded dashboard with dashboard Level filtering in URL
channel.description:
I have a dashboard that uses a dashboard level filter called Account. I created an external share link yet I can't see that dashboard level filter when I access the dashboard through the external link.
Also, I am trying to manipulate the filter (the dashboard level one which I can't see) or the other 6 filters on the dashboard through the URL and am not getting anywhere. I tried adding ?p_accounts=MYACCOUNT but it seems to not do anything both on the original URL and on the share URL.
The external share URL looks like this /public/dashboards/xxxxxxxxxxx?org_slug=default.
Any help is much appreciated.

item.title: Embedded dashboard with dashboard Level filtering in URL
item.dc:creator: jesse
item.description:
What kind of parameter is this? Text type params are disabled for public dashboards.

Read full topic
item.source: Embedded dashboard with dashboard Level filtering in URL

item.title: Embedded dashboard with dashboard Level filtering in URL
item.dc:creator: amitz
item.description:
I have a dashboard that uses a dashboard level filter called Account. I created an external share link yet I can’t see that dashboard level filter when I access the dashboard through the external link.

Also, I am trying to manipulate the filter (the dashboard level one which I can’t see) or the other 6 filters on the dashboard through the URL and am not getting anywhere.
I tried adding ?p_accounts=MYACCOUNT but it seems to not do anything both on the original URL and on the share URL.

The external share URL looks like this /public/dashboards/xxxxxxxxxxx?org_slug=default.

Any help is much appreciated.
